"A.P.241/9/23/10:30":
"Even as [Persona] became the host for the
[Profound Darkness], they have continued to
resist its control."

"Every time the [Profound Darkness] fights ARKS,
it is weakened. And every time, without fail,
[Persona] sends it back in time."

"Trapped in an endless cycle, they are returned
to the point where the [Profound Darkness] was
resurrected in its new form."

"We can't leave them like this, <%me>!
We have to save them!"
"[Persona] is the core of the [Profound Darkness]."

"As long as the connection between the two
remains, it'll be impossible to save [Persona]."

"Even if you succeeded at that, the [Profound Darkness]
will simply seek out a new host. This is the worst-case
scenario for us--It puts us back where we started."

"So, in order to save [Persona], we have to split them
apart, and utterly destroy the [Profound Darkness].
Previously, we had no way to do so."
"But... now we do!"

"By using the latent abilities of Hitsugi's
Ame-no-Murakumo, we've managed to find a way!"

"Her weapon, capable of separating light from darkness,
saved Aru and Mother from becoming a Dark Falz!"
"We should be able to apply the same theory here!"

"We were able to study Ame-no-Murakumo's
abilities through watching her in action, and
have managed to replicate them."

"Using the bond between you and [Persona],
simply call out for the sword, <%me>."

"I leave this power in your hands.
This is something that only you can do."

"Your task is simple:
<%me>, subdue the [Profound Darkness],
and reveal its core."
"If it works, you'll be able to separate the two."

"Then, the both of you will have
to use your powers, together as one."

"There's so many things I've wanted to say...
So many stories to share!"
"Are you ready, <%me>?"
